content: The president has ordered GM and Dodge to cut all sponsorship of NASCAR effective immediately, deeming it an "unnecessary expenditure."
reply: The president has ordered GM and Dodge to cut all sponsorship of NASCAR effective immediately, deeming it an "unnecessary expenditure."
title: Presidents orders GM and Dodge out of NASCAR

content: APRIL FOOLS!!!! And it was FORD and Dodge Todays politics remind me of an old saying. - "Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas?" - Joseph Stalin
